summary: It's a summer of fun for two teenaged boys who spend their time chasing two sisters, annoying a biker gang, and basically getting into typical sophomoric hijinks whenever they can.
cast: Michael Zelniker|Carl Marotte|Karen Stephen|Helene Udy|Thomas Kovacs|Joey McNamara|Joy Boushel|J. Robert Maze|Matthew Stevens|Sue Ronne|Bob King|Rob Stein|Rob Ferguson|Roland Nincheri|Lyn Jackson|Margaret Gadbois|Riva Spier|Eve Robin|Dick Grant|Steve Michaels|Sheila Graham|Don Pinatel|Peter MacMillan|Wally Martin|Bob Presner|Marc Denis|Arthur Smith|Mike Tomasek|Willy Wood|Ruth Sohmer|Pam Kearns|Joan Garnett|Dawn Dowling|Brenda Claire Hall|Kathy Pedersen|Lucy Topetta|Darlene Purkess|Wendy Dye|Susie Glynn|Johanne Sheehy|Ann Pilon|Renzo Tettamanti|Peter Kreisman
title: Pinball Summer
